survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers regarding their satisfaction with their home internet service provider, including reliability, speed, and customer service experiences.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home internet service provider?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home internet service provider?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues have you experienced with your home internet service in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify common pain points.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues have you experienced with your home internet service in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience slow internet speeds during peak hours (e.g., evenings)?

script.question_text: How often do you experience slow internet speeds during peak hours (e.g., evenings)?

questions.question_text: What is your average monthly download speed (in Mbps)?
questions.client_notes: Categorize speed tiers to evaluate service performance.

script.question_text: What is your average monthly download speed (in Mbps)?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the customer service provided by your internet service provider?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure customer service quality.

script.question_text: How would you rate the customer service provided by your internet service provider?

questions.question_text: Please describe any additional comments or suggestions you have for improving your home internet service.
questions.client_notes: Encourage detailed feedback to uncover specific issues or suggestions.

script.question_text: Please describe any additional comments or suggestions you have for improving your home internet service.
